scripts.restart: cd ../build && npm i && pm2 restart server
scripts.deploy: npm run build:frontend && npm run build && cp .env ../build/.env && npm run restart
scripts.image: cd .. && docker build -t mwpb/fowc-backend:$npm_package_version . && docker tag mwpb/fowc-backend:$npm_package_version mwpb/fowc-backend:latest
scripts.push: docker push mwpb/fowc-backend:$npm_package_version && docker push mwpb/fowc-backend:latest
scripts.deploy:docker: npm run build:frontend && npm run build && npm version patch && npm run image && npm run push
